Name: Alice's Mom's Rescue
About the game: Alice's Mom's Rescue is an indie puzzle / platformer game in the pure style of old school pixel art. The Giant Raven Has Captured Alice's mother. Help Alice save her mother through the 3 worlds and 25 levels! Change Alice's height by jumping on the magic mushrooms to get through the tiny spaces. But be aware that a small size will also affect Alice's physical abilities! Solve puzzles, beware of the evil cats, birds, bats & spikes, and find the right path to victory.
